00055 /* ************************ header area region *********************** */
00056 
00057 /************************** properties ******************************/
00058 
00059 static ARegion *clip_has_properties_region(ScrArea *sa)
00060 {
00061     ARegion *ar, *arnew;
00062 
00063     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_UI);
00064     if (ar)
00065         return ar;
00066 
00067     /* add subdiv level; after header */
00068     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_HEADER);
00069 
00070     /* is error! */
00071     if (ar == NULL)
00072         return NULL;
00073 
00074     arnew = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "clip properties region");
00075 
00076     BLI_insertlinkafter(&sa->regionbase, ar, arnew);
00077     arnew->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_UI;
00078     arnew->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_RIGHT;
00079 
00080     arnew->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00081 
00082     return arnew;
00083 }
00084 
00085 static int properties_poll(bContext *C)
00086 {
00087     return (CTX_wm_space_clip(C) != NULL);
00088 }
00089 
00090 static int properties_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00091 {
00092     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00093     ARegion *ar = clip_has_properties_region(sa);
00094 
00095     if (ar)
00096         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00097 
00098     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void CLIP_OT_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
00102 {
00103     /* identifiers */
00104     ot->name = "Properties";
00105     ot->description = "Toggle clip properties panel";
00106     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_properties";
00107 
00108     /* api callbacks */
00109     ot->exec = properties_exec;
00110     ot->poll = properties_poll;
00111 }
00112 
00113 /************************** tools ******************************/
00114 
00115 static ARegion *clip_has_tools_region(ScrArea *sa)
00116 {
00117     ARegion *ar, *artool = NULL, *arprops = NULL, *arhead;
00118 
00119     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00120         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_TOOLS)
00121             artool = ar;
00122 
00123         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_TOOL_PROPS)
00124             arprops = ar;
00125     }
00126 
00127     /* tool region hide/unhide also hides props */
00128     if (arprops && artool)
00129         return artool;
00130 
00131     if (artool == NULL) {
00132         /* add subdiv level; after header */
00133         arhead = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_HEADER);
00134 
00135         /* is error! */
00136         if (arhead == NULL)
00137             return NULL;
00138 
00139         artool = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "clip tools region");
00140 
00141         BLI_insertlinkafter(&sa->regionbase, arhead, artool);
00142         artool->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_TOOLS;
00143         artool->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_LEFT;
00144 
00145         artool->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00146     }
00147 
00148     if (arprops == NULL) {
00149         /* add extra subdivided region for tool properties */
00150         arprops = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "tool props for clip");
00151 
00152         BLI_insertlinkafter(&sa->regionbase, artool, arprops);
00153         arprops->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_TOOL_PROPS;
00154         arprops->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM|RGN_SPLIT_PREV;
00155     }
00156 
00157     return artool;
00158 }
00159 
00160 static int tools_poll(bContext *C)
00161 {
00162     return (CTX_wm_space_clip(C) != NULL);
00163 }
00164 
00165 static int tools_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00166 {
00167     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00168     ARegion *ar = clip_has_tools_region(sa);
00169 
00170     if (ar)
00171         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00172 
00173     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00174 }

00176 void CLIP_OT_tools(wmOperatorType *ot)
00177 {
00178     /* identifiers */
00179     ot->name = "Tools";
00180     ot->description = "Toggle clip tools panel";
00181     ot->idname = "CLIP_OT_tools";
00182 
00183     /* api callbacks */
00184     ot->exec = tools_exec;
00185     ot->poll = tools_poll;

00188 /************************** redo panel ******************************/
00189 
00190 static void clip_panel_operator_redo_buts(const bContext *C, Panel *pa, wmOperator *op)
00191 {
00192     uiLayoutOperatorButs(C, pa->layout, op, NULL, 'V', 0);
00193 }
00194 
00195 static void clip_panel_operator_redo_header(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00196 {
00197     wmOperator *op = WM_operator_last_redo(C);
00198 
00199     if (op)
00200         BLI_strncpy(pa->drawname, op->type->name, sizeof(pa->drawname));
00201     else
00202         BLI_strncpy(pa->drawname, "Operator", sizeof(pa->drawname));
00203 }
00204 
00205 static void clip_panel_operator_redo_operator(const bContext *C, Panel *pa, wmOperator *op)
00206 {
00207     if (op->type->flag & OPTYPE_MACRO) {
00208         for (op = op->macro.first; op; op = op->next) {
00209             uiItemL(pa->layout, op->type->name, ICON_NONE);
00210             clip_panel_operator_redo_operator(C, pa, op);
00211         }
00212     }
00213     else {
00214         clip_panel_operator_redo_buts(C, pa, op);
00215     }
00216 }
00217 
00218 /* TODO de-duplicate redo panel functions - campbell */
00219 static void clip_panel_operator_redo(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00220 {
00221     wmOperator *op = WM_operator_last_redo(C);
00222     uiBlock *block;
00223 
00224     if (op == NULL)
00225         return;
00226 
00227     if (WM_operator_poll((bContext*)C, op->type) == 0)
00228         return;
00229 
00230     block = uiLayoutGetBlock(pa->layout);
00231 
00232     if (!WM_operator_check_ui_enabled(C, op->type->name))
00233         uiLayoutSetEnabled(pa->layout, 0);
00234 
00235     /* note, blockfunc is a default but->func, use Handle func to allow button callbacks too */
00236     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, ED_undo_operator_repeat_cb_evt, op);
00237 
00238     clip_panel_operator_redo_operator(C, pa, op);
00239 }
00240 
00241 void ED_clip_tool_props_register(ARegionType *art)
00242 {
00243     PanelType *pt;
00244 
00245     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype clip panel last operator");
00246     strcpy(pt->idname, "CLIP_PT_last_operator");
00247     strcpy(pt->label, "Operator");
00248     pt->draw_header = clip_panel_operator_redo_header;
00249     pt->draw = clip_panel_operator_redo;
00250     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00251 }
